General.Name: Pungkang Co. Ltd
General.Description: Pungkang Co., Ltd. manufactures and sells nuts for automobile industry in Korea. The company offers wheel, lock, conical, weld, castle, flange, and hexagon-shaped nuts, as well as knurled, flared, and inverted nuts. It also provides bushing and spacer products. The company was formerly known as Pungkang Metal Industry Inc. and changed its name to Pungkang Co., Ltd. in 2001. Pungkang Co., Ltd. was founded in 1974 and is based in Hwaseong, South Korea.
